entry.title: Personality Trait Ideal in Different Parts of the World
entry.content:
Robert McCrae, research psychologist, mapped the world with different shadings indicating personality trait: darker shade means extroverted, while lighter shadings mean introverted. His reasearch was clear, Asia is introverted, and Europe is extroverted.
